concept.title: AFMC PGI 5315.403-1 Prohibition on Obtaining Certified Cost or Pricing Data (10 U.S.C. 2306a and 41 U.S.C., Chapter 35)

li.p: (c)(4)(A) Submit the formal request for exceptional case TINA waiver to SAF/AQC (with a courtesy copy to HQ AFMC/PKF) via the HQ AFMC/PK Workflow email account. It is a good practice for the local Pricing office to review the formal request for an exceptional case TINA waiver before the request is submitted to SAF/AQC.
